title: Causal Inference for Modality Debiasing in Multimodal Emotion Recognition
details: J Kim, J Hong, Y Choi - Applied Sciences, 2024
abstract: Multimodal emotion recognition (MER) aims to enhance the understanding of human emotions by integrating visual, auditory, and textual modalities. However, previous MER approaches often depend on a dominant modality rather than considering all …

title: Explainability and Interpretability of an Ensemble Multi-agent System for Supervised Learning
details: C Blanco-Volle, N Verstaevel, S Combettes… - International Conference on …, 2024
abstract: We present a multi-agent ensemble learning approach for supervised learning and evaluate its performance on a task of nonlinear function approximation. This approach relies on a set of learning agents that self-organize according to …
